title: Pair of 1909 Obaks available for sale/trade
author: shammus

posts.post_title: Pair of 1909 Obaks available for sale/trade
posts.post_content:
I have a pair of nice 1909 Obaks - Browning and Williams available.  Both exhibit very little wear.  Browning has some mild staining on the back and Williams has a crease in the upper left corner.  Both cards are free from damage on either side.  Asking $170 apiece which was roughly my cost for each card when purchased.  Thanks in advance,
Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]
